ingredients.text: ½ boneless sirloin end of Leg of Lamb.

directions.text: Roughly chop garlic in food processor, add mint and repeat.
Add sugar, salt, pepper, mustard and oil and blend to a paste.
Spread paste evenly inside the leg of lamb.
Tie the leg up with twine.
Setup grill for indirect heat, adding rosemary on the coals.
Cook skin side down for 20 mins.
Flip and rotate the roast, and cook till it reaches 135Â°
Remove twine, and rest under foil for 15 mins.
